Dimensional Merchant:
Hello!We are Dimensional Merchants, and we are helping all the adventurers of Elmoreden.
We are doing our best so that you could have a good time.
We offer a service of Dimensional items transfer within one account. In other words, you will be able to transfer the special Dimensional items from one character on your account to the others. Moreover, you will be able to change Attendance Coins to various items.
So, what do you want us to do?
